item.title: Implementing Apple Sign-In to an iOS App
item.description: Introduction The Apple Sign-In feature is very helpful and offers users login functionality with one click. It could be highly beneficial from a business perspective to attract more potential customers by providing easy and secure access to application functionality. In this article, I will focus on how to implement Apple Sign-In. Before implementation, letâ€™s set up the necessary options to be able to run the app without errors. Add Sign in with Apple Capability to the project 📝 Before testing on the simulator, you need to be signed in to an account with enabled two-factor authentication.
